item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:25AM; 3116 W Rowena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HXPF14; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: 21 firefighters extinguished the auto fires in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. Their quick actions prevented the fire from extending into the exposed apartment building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E482 E56 E82 RA35 RA835 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:11AM; 3116 W Rowena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HXPF14; Los Feliz; Multiple (reports of three) autos in a carport fully involved in fire. Fire attack is addressing the vehicles while additional firefighters are investigating to determine if there is any extension into the exposed, two story apartment building.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E482 E56 E82 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1615; 08:38PM; 1931 W 22nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nejPFh; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 72 firefighters battled heavy fire in a one story single family dwelling with full attic involvement and multiple trees/vegetation to the rear of the structure. Full extinguishment was achieved in 50 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the exposed buildings (on two sides). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E215 E226 E229 E29 E294 E34 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA11 RA13 RA826 RA829 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29 T3 UR3 ; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1615; 07:48PM; 1931 S La Salle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tg7X9G; Harvard Heights; One story, single family dwelling and detached garage with heavy fire and multiple additional buildings exposed. There are also trees (number unknown) on fire. Three additional task forces requested (not reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E11 E13 E215 E226 E29 RA13 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0275; 06:25AM; 1227 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zKGbDb; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E226 E266 E34 E46 RA46 RA66 T26 T66; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0275; 06:01AM; 1227 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zKGbDb; Vermont Square; Two story, four-plex with fire showing in one unit. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E226 E266 E34 E46 RA46 RA66 T26 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0039; 01:04AM; 1578 E 21st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f7p7xT; Central-Alameda; 37 Firefighters took 22 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive fire attack that contained the bulk of fire to a well involved 'bus type' (?) vehicle and other property to the rear of a 1 story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E14 E210 E9 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0039; 12:42AM; 1578 E 21st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f7p7xT; Central-Alameda; PRELIM: Truck heavily involved with fire to the rear of a 1 story home, with flames threatening the residence; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E10 E14 E210 RA14 RA17 SQ21 T10; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1627; 09:08PM; 13305 W Arminta St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3f6dEyv; #SunValley; 46 Firefighters took just 30 minutes to extinguish heavy fire in a 2,147 square-foot one-story home. All four occupants exited the structure safely prior to LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E289 E290 E39 E77 EM14 RA39 RA889 T39 T60 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
